docs.title: Pre-impact fall detection
docs.text:
• Research on real-time fall detection preventing the elderly from injury
  • Constructed algorithm models using neural network approach based on Ghost-Net combined with LSTM, reduced the time delay with fewer model parameters
  • Applied weighted preprocessing to the data in order to enhance real-time performance and compatibility on tiny mobile devices

docs.title: Data-based approach to forecast renewable energy
docs.text:
• Made predictions based on meteorology data from solar power station
  • Organized and cleaned the data and analyzed the correlation, extracted temporal information for time-series prediction
  • Constructed algorithm with different structure including ARIMA model and recurrent neural network, judge the effect by evaluation indicators
